column1: The Pit Room////Very nearly the best BBQ I've ever had
column2: and hands down my new go-to BBQ place to take people visiting from out of town. The brisket is ridiculous (but
column4: in the best way). Their house-made sauces are on-point. The tacos? Oh man
column5: the chicken taco with charred garlic is just stupidly delicious. I haven't tried all the meats yet and am holding off on trying the chili until it's closer to sweater weather
column6: but everything I've had so far has been good. The only weak link I've found is that the elote tasted a little plain
column7: it was still early days when I had it though... Excited to have a place for great BBQ in the neighborhood.
